title: Butterball Hotline | Colbert Classic
description:
It's important to get accurate information on turkey preparation this time of year, so back in 2016, Stephen volunteered to man the phones at the Butterball Turkey Talk-Line, and his timeless advice has been coming to the rescue of countless Thanksgiving dinners ever since.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
